title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A brutally honest guide to living a better life by caring less about more things.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy & proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: A deeply personal memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

author: George Orwell
description: A novel about a totalitarian regime that watches everything.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical tale about a shepherd’s journey to discover his personal legend.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
description: What the rich teach their kids about money that the poor and middle class do not.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern age.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a survivalist family and seeks education.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A guide to spiritual enlightenment and living in the present moment.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: A groundbreaking tour of the mind and how we make decisions.

title: The Four Agreements
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
description: A practical guide to personal freedom based on ancient Toltec wisdom.

title: The Book Thief
author: Markus Zusak
description: A story of a girl in Nazi Germany who finds solace in stealing books.

title: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
description: Master your mind and defy the odds with David Goggins’ life story.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A science fiction epic about politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story about teenage rebellion and identity.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A novel about the infinite choices that shape our lives.

title: The 48 Laws of Power
author: Robert Greene
description: An amoral, cunning, ruthless, and instructive guide to power.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world.
